name: 4tools
body:
# 4Tools
Today's Modern™ and Sophisticated™ 4chan user requires more than the standard inline extension.  
Here's how to up your game.

## Install either 4chan-X or Appchan X
Both are extensions that work similar to 4chan's inline extension, but with more ~~bloat~~ features.  
I prefer 4chan-X, but Appchan X is a bit more tailored to those who want to customize their visual experience.

### 4chan-X
**Chrome**: Just install ccd0's version from the Chrome Store [Here]( https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/4chan-x/ohnjgmpcibpbafdlkimncjhflgedgpam)  
**Firefox**: First install [Greasemonkey](https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/greasemonkey/), restart Firefox, then install [ccd0's 4chan-X](https://ccd0.github.io/4chan-x/builds/4chan-X.user.js)

### Appchan X
**Chrome**: Just install Appchan X from the Chrome Store [Here](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/appchan-x/gfibffekgcmgabbfaibbbcapgnfobnoi)  
**Firefox**: First install [Greasemonkey](https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/greasemonkey/), restart Firefox, then install [Appchan X](https://github.com/zixaphir/appchan-x/raw/stable/builds/appchan-x.user.js)

## Do a quick configuration
Both 4chan-X and Appchan X come with reasonable settings out of the box, but you'll need to change a few things.

### 4chan-X
* Click the wrench in the top right corner on any 4chan page and check the **Show Name and Subject** box under **Posting**

### Appchan X
¯\_(ツ)_/¯  
I'll fill this in once I figure it out. I'll probably just upload reasonable settings from one of the users.

### Install Namesync
Almost ready for namefagging! Now you just need to install Namesync to "enable" names on /b/ and other Anonymous boards.

**Chrome**: Just install Namesync from the Chrome Store [Here](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/4chan-x-name-sync/oplkokdeabkddkihcbghgmpcamnddegk)
**Firefox**: Install the Namesync [userscript](https://www.namesync.org/namesync/builds/NameSync.user.js)

After reloading a thread, you should be able to see other Namesync user's names and display your own using the fields on the Quick Reply dialog.
